seo.title: Phonetic Name Matching for KYC & AML | Decentro
seo.description: Enhance identity verification with Decentro's phonetic name matching. Accurately identify individuals despite spelling variations, reduce fraud, and ensure AML compliance.
seo.ogTitle: Boost KYC Accuracy with Phonetic Matching | Decentro

productBanner.heading: Phonetic Name Matching for KYC & Fraud Prevention
productBanner.tagline: Accurately identify individuals by matching names that sound alike, overcoming spelling variations and typos to enhance data forensics and compliance.
productBanner.altText: Phonetic Name Matching for Identity Verification

horizontalItemsData.heading: Why Decentro's Phonetic Matching
horizontalItemsData.tagline: Advanced Identity Verification for Modern Businesses

items.title: Advanced Phonetic Algorithms
items.description: Utilizes sophisticated algorithms to identify matches between names that sound similar, regardless of spelling discrepancies, enhancing accuracy.

items.title: Fuzzy Matching Capabilities
items.description: Goes beyond exact matches to account for common variations, abbreviations, and data entry errors, ensuring comprehensive identity resolution.

items.title: Customizable Matching Logic
items.description: Allows businesses to tailor matching sensitivity and rules to their specific risk appetite and compliance requirements, offering flexible control.

textAndButtonBannerData.ctaDescription: Implement advanced phonetic matching to reduce fraud, streamline onboarding, and ensure robust compliance effortlessly.

data.text: Streamline customer onboarding, enhance AML compliance, prevent identity fraud, and accurately link customer records across banking and fintech operations.
Verify policyholders and beneficiaries, detect fraudulent claims, and ensure accurate customer data management for robust risk assessment and compliance.
Onboard sellers and vendors, verify customer identities for high-value transactions, and prevent account takeovers to secure digital platforms.
Ensure age verification, comply with regulatory requirements, and prevent multi-accounting fraud to maintain fair play and responsible gaming environments.
Accurately identify patients, link medical records, and prevent duplicate entries, ensuring patient safety, data integrity, and streamlined administration.
Enhance citizen identity verification, improve service delivery, and prevent benefit fraud, ensuring efficient and secure public services.

block1.heading:
Enhanced
Compliance Confidence
block1.paragraph: Meet stringent regulatory requirements (KYC, AML) with greater confidence and reduced risk exposure.

block1.heading:
Robust
Fraud Prevention
block1.paragraph: Proactively identify and mitigate risks associated with identity fraud and suspicious activities effectively.

Customer Experience
block1.paragraph: Accelerate onboarding times and significantly reduce friction for legitimate customers, improving satisfaction.

block1extra.paragraph: Automate manual review processes, minimize human error, and significantly reduce operational costs.

block1extra.heading:

Data Quality
block1extra.paragraph: Ensure cleaner, more reliable customer data across all systems, enhancing decision-making and analytics.

block1extra.heading:

Verification Speed
block1extra.paragraph: Designed for instantaneous identity verification, crucial for seamless customer onboarding and transaction monitoring.

recommendedPages.title: KYC & Onboarding
